name: E-Flight Academy
about: E-Flight Academy is a premier online aviation school offering comprehensive courses for aspiring pilots, mechanics, and cabin crew members. Our e-learning platform provides 100% live online classes, 24/7 class recordings, interactive presentations, and academic advisors to guide students. With a flexible schedule, students can study anytime, anywhere using their smartphone, tablet, or laptop. Our programs include ground courses for airline and helicopter pilots, IFR ratings, and multi-ratings. We also offer an international exchange program and significant cost savings. E-Flight Academy is dedicated to making aviation education accessible and convenient, ensuring students achieve their aviation dreams with support and guidance every step of the way.
